{"recommendation":"Cervical Screening Due Now","recommendationGroup":"Screening: Average Risk","recommendationDetails":["Per USPSTF guidelines, this patient is due for cervical cancer screening. The screening can be performed by using: 1) cervical cytology testing alone, 2) hrHPV testing alone, or 3) cotesting with cervical cytology testing and hrHPV testing."],"recommendationDate":"2022-09-19","errors":[],"disclaimer":"An evidence based recommendation is provided based on clinical data available in the patient's electronic medical record. orderDetail.text: Per USPSTF guidelines, this patient is due for cervical cancer screening. The screening can be performed by using: 1) cervical cytology testing alone, 2) hrHPV testing alone, or 3) cotesting with cervical cytology testing and hrHPV testing.
